name: Super Pika Land Ultra: Vanilla Version
overview: This is the totally definitely FINAL final version of Super Pika Land Ultra, a hack that has been worked on infrequently since the last release. Alterations of some of the levels have been made in an attempt to balance the difficulty (and added one extra level in world 5) The graphics are totally vanilla, with the exceptions of: Pikachu/Raichu and his Pokémon Trainer The Thunderstone, which replaces the Mushroom Yoshi Coins, which are now Pokécoins A few overworld tiles Titlescreen stuff Statusbar stuff Switch Palace Stuff Player Tileset Stuff Fire Flower mechanics Along with graphical changes, I’ve: Added custom music Removed the score counter and the timer Removed Bonus Star counter and disabled the Bonus Game Made a metric Muk-ton of hex edits Disabled 2-Player mode (it was really buggy
